pages.text: Snowball Chickens are frosty and damp to the touch. For some reason, they like wearing a Pumpkin on their head; no one knows where and how they get one, though...$(br)Lay Item: Snowballs.$(br2)They $(o)really$() dislike being thrown around. Fire causes them to melt.
Punished Daisy can turn a Chicken into a Snowball Chicken when provided with some water.
